pool1976 at 2010-12-06 10:46 CET:
"six episodes. you cant call that a season. its half a short season at best. crazy stuff"
In England, 6 eps is usually a normal season...  Just FYI.
We Americans are used to 20+ ep seasons, but I think AMC either wanted to preserve the comic-book nature of TWD with a limited season, or they felt the nature of the series was too risky to invest a full season in.
